author: JamesWTruher
body: We don't need to run these tests on all platforms, especially as the endpoint has intermittent failures.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @JamesWTruher Please run with `[Feature]` so the modified test is executed.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: `[Feature]` tag does not run `scenario` tests. Merging this.

title: Run tests for Windows Installer only on Windows
